metadata.name: Aurora Scratch Card
metadata.description: Reveal foil-backed rewards by scratching away a shimmering cover.

defaults.title: Aurora Scratch Card
defaults.description: Claim a radiant foil, then do the scratching yourself to reveal the treasure hidden beneath. Every swipe clears the nebula shimmer until your prize erupts in full color.
defaults.prizeLedgerSubtitle: Review every reward hiding beneath the aurora foil.
defaults.prizeListErrorText: We could not load the prize ledger. Please refresh to try again.
defaults.attemptErrorText: Something interrupted the scratch card attempt. Please try again.
defaults.defaultFlairText: The foil peels away and the prize gleams brilliantly! ✨

prizes.name: Starlit Token
prizes.description: A token etched with constellations, good for a single campfire wish.
prizes.flairText: Starlight flickers across the token as it reveals itself.

prizes.name: Glimmer Thread
prizes.description: Woven from comet tails, it reinforces any gear you stitch it into.
prizes.flairText: Threads of light twirl in the air as the prize emerges.

prizes.name: Charm of Dawn
prizes.description: A radiant charm that greets every sunrise with a burst of optimism.
prizes.flairText: The charm gleams with the first light of morning.

prizes.name: Eclipse Crest
prizes.description: A crest forged from shadow and light, empowering the bearer at dusk.
prizes.flairText: A halo of twilight blooms around the crest.

prizes.name: Aurora Heart
prizes.description: A prismatic core that pulses with the aurora's rhythm and courage.
prizes.flairText: The aurora surges as the heart ignites in your hands.
